page.title: 19DAY IN THE LIFE OF.....
page.content: Orla Pattle is 12 years old and 3 months ago she moved into the Dunham area.Orla lives in one of the Dunham Woodhouses,Forge Cottage.She lives with her mum,dad and brother Justin.Orla usually gets up in the morning at 7.30am,her dad drives her to school.The journey takes 10 minutes.She goes to Loreto Grammar School.After school Orla catches the 4.15 bus and she arrives home at 4.30pm.When Orla is at home she puts on her slippers and sits watching television eating sweets.At 6.00pm Orla's mum comes home from work and so then Orla has her tea,then does her homework.After tea Orla and her brother take the dog Mitzie for a walk at Dunham Park.In the evening Orla goes late night shopping with her mum at Tesco's in Irlam.She goes to bed at 10.00pm.
